member.name: T:Pacifica.Core.MyEMSLStatusCheck
member.summary: Examine the status of a given ingest job

remarks.para: First call GetIngestStatus then call IngestStepCompleted. This allows for just one web request, but the ability to examine the status of multiple steps
This class is used by Capture Task Manager plugins Archive Verify and Archive Status Check

member.name: P:Pacifica.Core.MyEMSLStatusCheck.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Error message

member.name: M:Pacifica.Core.MyEMSLStatusCheck.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor

member.summary: Examine the task name and percent complete to determine the number of ingest steps that have been completed

member.name: M:Pacifica.Core.MyEMSLStatusCheck.DoesFileExistInMyEMSL(Pacifica.Core.FileInfoObject)
member.summary: Check whether a file exists in MyEMSL
member.remarks: Searches using Sha1HashHex, so could match a file in a different location than the specific path tracked by fileInfo
member.returns: True if found, otherwise false

member.name: M:Pacifica.Core.MyEMSLStatusCheck.GetIngestStatus(System.String,System.String@,System.Int32@,System.Boolean@,System.String@)
member.summary: Obtain the status returned by the given MyEMSL status page
member.param: Output: ingest process percent complete (value between 0 and 100)
Output: true if an error occurs
Output: error message if lookupError is true
member.returns: Status dictionary (empty dictionary if an error)

member.returns: The status number, or 0 if an error

member.name: M:Pacifica.Core.MyEMSLStatusCheck.IngestStepCompletionCount(System.Int32)
member.summary: Percent complete (value between 0 and 100)
member.remarks: Reports 7 when percentComplete is 100
member.returns: Number of steps completed

member.name: P:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.TransferFolderPath

member.name: P:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.JobNumber
member.summary: Capture Task DB job number for the DatasetArchive or ArchiveUpdate Job
member.remarks: The metadata.txt file name will include the JobNumber text in the name, for example MyEMSL_metadata_CaptureJob_12345.txt For DataPackages we store DataPackageId in JobNumber

member.name: P:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.UseTestInstance
member.summary: When true, upload to ingestdmsdev.my.emsl.pnl.gov instead of ingestdms.my.emsl.pnl.gov

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.#ctor(Pacifica.Core.Configuration)
member.summary: Constructor (TransferFolderPath and JobNumber will be empty)
member.remarks: This constructor is used by the DataPackage Archive Manager

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.#ctor(Pacifica.Core.Configuration,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor
member.remarks: The metadata.txt file will be copied to the transfer folder
member.param: Transfer folder path for this dataset, for example \\proto-4\DMS3_Xfer\IFT001_Pool_17_B_10x_27Aug13_Tiger_13-07-36

member.name: E:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.MyEMSLOffline
member.summary: MyEMSL Offline event

member.name: E:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.UploadCompleted
member.summary: Upload completed event

member.name: E:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.StatusUpdate
member.summary: Status updated event

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.StartUpload(System.Collections.Generic.List{Pacifica.Json.IUploadMetadata},System.String@)
member.summary: Update the files and data tracked by metadataObject to MyEMSL
member.remarks: This method is used by the DataPackage Archive Manager
member.returns: True if successfully uploaded, false if an error

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.StartUpload(System.Collections.Generic.List{Pacifica.Json.IUploadMetadata},Pacifica.DataUpload.TarStreamUploader.UploadDebugMode,System.String@)
member.summary: Update the files and data tracked by metadataObject to MyEMSL
member.param: Set to UploadDebugMode.CreateTarLocal to authenticate with MyEMSL, then create a .tar file locally instead of actually uploading it Set to UploadDebugMode.MyEMSLOfflineMode to create the .tar file locally without contacting MyEMSL
member.returns: True if successfully uploaded, false if an error

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.CreatePacificaMetadataObject(Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.UploadMetadata,System.Collections.Generic.List{Pacifica.Core.FileInfoObject},Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.EUSInfo@)
member.summary: Create the metadata object with the upload details, including the files to upload
member.param: Output parameter: EUS instrument ID, project ID, and uploader ID
member.returns: Dictionary of the information to translate to JSON; Keys are key names; values are either strings or dictionary objects or even a list of dictionary objects

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.GetMetadataObjectDescription(System.Collections.Generic.List{Pacifica.Json.IUploadMetadata})
member.summary: Return a string description of the EUS info encoded by metadataObject

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.GetEUSInstrumentID(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return the EUS instrument ID, falling back to instrumentIdIfUnknown if eusInstrumentId is empty

member.name: M:Pacifica.DataUpload.Upload.GetEUSProjectID(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Validate the EUS project ID, or use the default
member.remarks: This is a string because the project ID may contain suffix letters

member.name: T:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject
member.summary: DMS metadata object

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.LARGE_DATASET_ARCHIVE_THRESHOLD_GB
member.summary: If a dataset archive task involves more 15 GB of data, only archive the root directory and the QC directory Use property SkippedDatasetArchiveSubdirectories to view the skipped subdirectory names

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.MAX_FILES_TO_ARCHIVE
member.summary: Maximum number of files to archive
member.remarks: If uploading an entire dataset directory and all of its subdirectories via a DatasetArchive operation, this value applies to all files in the dataset directory (and subdirectories) If uploading just one dataset subdirectory via an ArchiveUpdate operation, this value applies to all files in that subdirectory

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.SOURCE_DIRECTORY_NOT_FOUND
member.summary: Error message thrown when the dataset directory is not found

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.TOO_MANY_FILES_TO_ARCHIVE
member.summary: Error message thrown when the dataset directory has too many files to archive

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.UNDEFINED_EUS_OPERATOR_ID
member.summary: Error message thrown when the dataset instrument operator does not have an EUS person ID

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.EUS_PORTAL_URL
member.summary: URL of the EUS website
member.remarks: Previously https://eusi.emsl.pnnl.gov/Portal/

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.HASHING_FILES
member.summary: Text to show when reporting progress

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.mRemoteCacheInfoFilesToRetrieve
member.summary: List of remote files that were found using CacheInfo files

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.mRemoteCacheInfoLockFiles
member.summary: Keys in this dictionary are lock directory share paths (for example \\proto-6\DMS_LockFiles) Values are the corresponding lock file info object

member.name: E:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.ZeroByteFileEvent
member.summary: Event raised when a zero byte file is encountered

member.name: T:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.ArchiveModes
member.summary: Archive modes

member.name: F:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.ArchiveModes.archive
member.summary: Archive files (initial push of a dataset's files into MyEMSL)

member.summary: Add/update a dataset's files

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.DatasetName
member.summary: Dataset name

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.EUSInfo
member.summary: EUS Info

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.JobNumber
member.summary: Job number (in the DMS_Capture database)
member.remarks: 0 if no job number

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.IgnoreMaxFileLimit
member.summary: When true, allow over 500 files to be pushed to MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.IgnoreMyEMSLFileTrackingError
member.summary: when True, allow the ingest step to proceed, even if MyEMSL is tracking fewer files than expected for a given dataset

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.ManagerName
member.summary: Manager name

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.MetadataObject
member.summary: Object that tracks the upload details, including the files to upload
member.remarks: The objects in this list are translated to a single JSON string

member.name: P:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.SkippedDatasetArchiveSubdirectories
member.summary: Subdirectory names that were skipped during a DatasetArchive task because we're pushing more than 15 GB of data

member.summary: Number of bytes to upload

member.summary: Number of new files pushed to MyEMSL

member.summary: True to enable trace mode

member.summary: True to use the Test instance

True to find files in all subdirectories

member.summary: Query server for files and hash codes

member.summary: Query the DMS_Capture database to determine the number of files that MyEMSL should be tracking for this dataset
member.param: Number of times to try again if the data cannot be retrieved

member.summary: Check whether a file should be ignored when either uploading files or comparing existing files to files already in MyEMSL

member.returns: True if the file should be ignored

member.name: M:Pacifica.DMSDataUpload.DMSMetadataObject.IgnoreFile(System.String)
member.summary: Check whether a file should be ignored when either uploading files or comparing existing files to files already in MyEMSL
member.remarks: Ignore files .DS_Store and Thumbs.db Also ignore files that end with .sqlite-journal
member.returns: True if the file should be ignored

member.summary: Get a list of file names that we can ignore when transferring data to MyEMSL or comparing files on disk to files in MyEMSL

member.name: T:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo
member.summary: Metadata for files in MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Valid
member.summary: True if essential values are set.

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Filename
member.summary: Filename

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.FileID
member.summary: File ID in MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.HashSum
member.summary: File hash (typically SHA-1)

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.HashType
member.summary: Hash type

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Created
member.summary: Time created in MyEMSL
member.remarks: Use UpdateRemoteFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Updated
member.summary: Time updated in MyEMSL (typically identical to Created)
member.remarks: Use UpdateRemoteFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Deleted
member.summary: Time deleted in MyEMSL; null if not deleted
member.remarks: Use UpdateRemoteFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.FileCreationTime
member.summary: Original file creation time (on the host system prior to MyEMSL ingest)
member.remarks: Use UpdateSourceFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.FileLastWriteTime
member.summary: Last modification time (on the host system prior to MyEMSL ingest)
member.remarks: Use UpdateSourceFileTimes to update this value

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Size
member.summary: File size, in bytes

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.SubDir
member.summary: Subdirectory (subfolder) below the dataset folder

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.TransactionId
member.summary: Transaction ID
member.remarks: All files uploaded in a given batch will have the same transaction ID

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Dataset
member.summary: Dataset Name

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.DatasetID
member.summary: DatasetID

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.Instrument
member.summary: Instrument name for this file
member.remarks: Will be blank for data package files

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.DatasetYearQuarter
member.summary: Dataset year-quarter string, for example 2013_3
member.remarks: Will be blank for data package files

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithDataset
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the dataset name
member.remarks: Uses Windows-style slashes

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithDatasetUnix
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the dataset name
member.remarks: Uses Unix-style slashes

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithInstrumentAndDatasetUnix
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the instrument, year_quarter, and dataset
member.remarks: Uses Unix-style slashes

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.PathWithInstrumentAndDatasetWindows
member.summary: Relative path to the file, including the instrument, year_quarter, and dataset
member.remarks: Uses Windows-style slashes. Note that instrument IMS_TOF_4 was renamed to IMS04_AgTOF05 in 2013, and thus there are datasets with files associated with both instruments in MyEMSL

member.name: P:Pacifica.Json.MyEMSLFileInfo.RelativePathWindows
member.summary: Path to the file, relative to the dataset folder
member.remarks: Uses Windows-style slashes
